Class RuleNet

public class RuleNet
extends java.lang.Object

Constructor Summary
RuleNet(java.util.Vector a)
          constructor is given the RuleNodes in the network
 
Method Summary
 void addFact(java.lang.String f)
          add a fact and make all the deductions by calling self.propagate
 java.util.Vector getRules()
          accessor for the RuleNodes
 void initialise()
          Initialise all the RuleNodes to contain a single token: all antecedents, empty context
 void propagate()
          drive the propagation of facts take next fact from factsToPropagate take the list of nodes to propagate it to from targetNodeLists do this using the node's propagate method if this results in deductions, then for each deduction print it out add it to factsToPropagate add the rulenode's successors list to targetNodeLists continue until no more facts to propagate

public void initialise()

addFact

public void addFact(java.lang.String f)
add a fact and make all the deductions by calling self.propagate

propagate

public void propagate()
drive the propagation of facts take next fact from factsToPropagate take the list of nodes to propagate it to from targetNodeLists do this using the node's propagate method if this results in deductions, then for each deduction print it out add it to factsToPropagate add the rulenode's successors list to targetNodeLists continue until no more facts to propagate
